name: Cross-Project Piping
description: Cross-Project Piping pipes from one field in one project into another field in another project. The projects have to be MATCHED on a third field in both projects. Enable this module in the DESTINATION project and select appropriate fields in the configure panel.

project-settings.name: Only users with design rights on all source projects are allowed to configure this module.

sub_settings.name: Unique Match Field: Unique field used to match records across projects (usually the record_id)
Alternate Source Match Field: This is only used if the Unique Match Field in the destination project has a different variable name from the Unique Match Field in the source project
Source Field: This field is only needed if the Destination Field has a different variable name from the Source Field on the source project

project-settings.name: Active Form(s): Limit piping to only these forms

choices.name: Piping Button at top of Form(s)

project-settings.name: Add a 'Pipe All Records' button to this project's Record Status Dashboard
Enable verbose logging for record pipe failures when piping via 'Pipe All' button
Allow piping on forms this status or less
